zh.title: 波兰红衣主教卡罗尔·沃伊蒂瓦当选教皇约翰·保罗二世
南非主教德斯蒙德·图图获诺贝尔和平奖
莱茵哈德·哈恩因间谍罪在民主德国被捕
以色列总理拉宾遇刺身亡
中国首次载人航天飞行任务成功返回
亚洲相互协作与信任措施会议成员国外长会议召开
美国宣布退出联合国教科文组织
中国神舟十三号载人飞船成功发射

en.title: Pope John Paul II elected as the 264th Pope
Desmond Tutu wins the Nobel Peace Prize.
Black Monday stock market crash begins.
Million Man March takes place in Washington, D.C.
Bibliotheca Alexandrina in Egypt is officially opened.
Formula One driver Fernando Alonso wins the World Championship.
Cyclone Ophelia reaches Ireland, causing widespread damage.
NASA's Psyche mission launches to explore a metal-rich asteroid.
